section.title: The Add bookmark command
section.para: Choose this to add a bookmark to the bookmark list. The offset of the bookmark will be set to the current position initially. You can also add a description for the bookmark that will also appear in the menu.

section.title: The Remove bookmark command
section.para: Choose this to remove a bookmark from the bookmark list. You will be presented with a list of the bookmarks and have to choose the one to remove.
